price: Kendilerine Kitap'tan nasip verilenlere baksana! Sapıklığı satın alıyorlar ve sizin de yoldan sapmanızı istiyorlar!
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ نَصِيبٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ يَشۡتَرُونَ ٱلضَّلَٰلَةَ وَيُرِيدُونَ أَن تَضِلُّواْ ٱلسَّبِيلَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam tara ilā alladhīna ūtū naṣīban mina al-kitābi yashtarūna al-ḍalālata wayurīdūna an taḍillū al-sabīla
